snippet: Mitt Romney used an appearance at a downtown Manhattan firehouse to keep the pot boiling between him and President Obama over the decision to pursue Bin Laden into Pakistan, accusing Mr. Obama of politicizing the issue.
abstract: Mitt Romney used an appearance at a downtown Manhattan firehouse to keep the pot boiling between him and President Obama over the decision to pursue Bin Laden into Pakistan, accusing Mr. Obama of politicizing the issue.

headline.main: Romney, Near Ground Zero, Faults Obama for Politicizing Raid
